pkgmetadata.longdescription: Improved Shrinkage Estimations for Multiple Linear Regression // A variety of improved shrinkage estimators in the area of statistical analysis: unrestricted; restricted; preliminary test; improved preliminary test; Stein; and positive-rule Stein. More details can be found in chapter 7 of Saleh, A. K. Md. E. (2006) ISBN: 978-0-471-56375-4.
